title: unknownhost.name
description: Personal website built with Deno Fresh, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to showcase projects and technical work.

title: Oats
description: Ahead-of-time compiler for a TypeScript-inspired language, influenced by Swift and Rust. Compiles to native executables via LLVM for predictable performance and a minimal runtime.

title: Boiler
description: TypeScript-based chat server built on Deno that uses WebSockets and REST APIs. Designed for extensibility and developer experimentation.

title: VEX Robotics Competition
description: High-school VEX Robotics team member; served as programmer and designer. Team qualified for the Indiana State Championship in 2023.

title: Katana
description: Prototype datastore storing string arrays in JSON for rapid prototyping and experimentation.

title: firefox-discord
description: Browser extension that shares the current site to Discord presence.

title: SmoreSoftware
description: Founder of a small development team that created Discord bots.
